org.apache.xml.security.algorithms
Class JCEMapper

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.xml.security.algorithms.JCEMapper

public class JCEMapper
extends java.lang.Object

This class maps algorithm identifier URIs to JAVA JCE class names.

$Author: raul $
